{{Advert|article|date=February 2009}} {{Unreferenced|date=June 2011}} {{Coord|18.537222|73.731388|region:IN_type:edu_scale:2000_source:wikimapia|display=title}} {{Infobox university |name = Symbiosis Institute of Telecom Management |image =[[Image:Sitm img.jpg|center|260px|SITM]] |motto = Creating world class Technology Business Leaders |established = 1996 |type = [[Management Education and Research Institution]] |city = [[Pune]] |country = India |faculty = |postgrad = MBA |students = 120 |free_label = [[Alumni]] |free = 1100 |type = [[Private university|Private]]
[[Business school]] |campus = Urban, {{convert|350|acre|km2|1}} |city = [[Pune]] |state = [[Maharashtra]] |country = [[India]] |affiliations = [[Symbiosis International University]] |website = [http://sitm.ac.in sitm.ac.in] }} '''Symbiosis Institute of Telecom Management''' ('''SITM''') is a [[business school]] in [[Pune]], [[India]]. It is specializes in imparting management education to managers in the [[telecommunication]]s sector. SITM is affiliated to the Symbiosis International University.It is the pioneer in Telecom management education in the entire SAARC region.{{Citation needed|date=June 2011}} SITM offers the [[Master of Business Administration]] in Telecom Management (MBA-TM), a two-year residential program. ==External links== ===Official Links=== {{Commons category}} *[http://www.sitm.ac.in The SITM Website] *[http://www.siu.edu.in Symbiosis International University Website] * The New Campus at Lavale is at coordinates {{Coord|18.5373|73.731651|type:edu}} {{Symbiosis Society}} [[Category:Business schools in Maharashtra]] [[Category:Telecommunications in India]] [[Category:Educational institutions established in 1996]] [[Category:Education in Pune]] {{India-university-stub}}
